1.title: I'm the Big Guy
1.plot: Vince considers peace with Sam for the sake of his family. Everyone gets involved and a face-to-face sit-down is arranged with the two rivals. Everything erupts when it doesn't go as planned.

2.title: Bad Blood
2.plot: Foul play at Vince's club raises suspicions that his rival, Sam, may be trying to sabotage him. Vince calls on his connections with one of Pittsburgh's motorcycle gangs for help. Meanwhile, Vince pushes his eldest son Enzo to work hard towards his future so he doesn't have to rely on family money. His younger son Adolfo asks Vince for a favor involving a trip in the Lamborghini.

3.title: Sammi Needs Help
3.plot: Vince's niece, Sammi, is battling addiction and needs help. The family tries to get Vince to put his anger toward her father Sam aside and come to Sammi's aid. Adolfo directs a movie starring the entire Isoldi family and goes on a power trip.

4.title: Donna's Male Strip Club
4.plot: Vince is surprised when he discovers his sister Donna has plans to open a male strip club in the basement of Club Erotica. Meanwhile, Junior goes in search of hidden mob money he thinks has been stashed in the walls of Vince's club. Adolfo gets his first girlfriend.

5.title: Sweeney's Lost Son
5.plot: Vince offers to help his most trusted employee and friend, Sweeney, find his missing son. With custody papers in hand, Vince and Sweeney are frustrated with "the system" and are tempted to take matters into their own hands.

6.title: Bad Brothers
6.plot: Tensions are high in the Isoldi family. Vince and his brother Angelo aren't seeing eye-to-eye and the rest of his family struggles with planning their mother's 75th birthday celebration. Meanwhile, Adolfo's budget soars when he decides to remodel his office.

7.title: Intervention
7.plot: Vince's niece Sammi continues to struggle with her heroin addiction. When she wins the lottery her family fears the sudden windfall will only progress her drug use and they decide to arrange an intervention. Can Vince put the family conflict aside long enough to help?

8.title: A Last Hurrah
8.plot: After a break-in at Club Erotica, Vince fears someone from his past is trying to kill him and he whisks the family away to their summer home for a vacation. Meanwhile, Junior and Johnny Bananas take Vince's boat out for a day of fun and debauchery.

9.title: The Big Meet
9.plot: Vince considers peace with Sam for the sake of his family. Everyone gets involved and a face-to-face sit-down is arranged with the two rivals. Everything erupts when it doesn't go as planned.

imdb.plot outline: About Godfather of Pittsburgh A and E's new original real-life series Godfather of Pittsburgh follows Vince Isoldi, a businessman with a dark past, as he tries to stay on the right side of the law. For Vince Isoldi nothing is more important than family. Some may say he's a gangster but according to Vince, he's just a good businessman. An entrepreneur with a sordid past, Vince has built an empire in Pittsburgh, from nightclubs to real estate, all in hopes of providing a better life for his family. Unfortunately, getting to the top means making a lot of enemies and in Vince's case some of them are family. Godfather of Pittsburgh follows Vince as he balances his family life while trying to walk the "straight and narrow" and still succeed in business. From a young age Vince felt compelled to look after his family, often going to extreme measures to provide for them. Years later, little has changed; between his wife and sons, and his six brothers and sisters, Vince still finds himself playing the role of provider. While Vince isn't proud of everything he's done, he certainly doesn't regret it either.
